amendment.description: To make available to the Department of State for the purpose of providing support for the rapid expansion of the African Union mission in Darfur, Sudan, $75,000,000, to be designated as an emergency requirement.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3671 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3671 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S9581-9585; text: CR S9581) To make available to the Department of State for the purpose of providing support for the rapid expansion of the African Union mission in Darfur, Sudan, $75,000,000, to be designated as an emergency requirement.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3671 proposed by Senator Corzine.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3671 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
